entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 03:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
Temperature: -36.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -40.5°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
